Uses of Class
accounts.BankAccount

  • Packages that use BankAccount 
    Package Description
    accounts  

    • Uses of BankAccount in accounts

      Subclasses of BankAccount in accounts 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CheckingAccount
      CheckingAccount is used to create checking account objects and to hold methods which are unique to checking accounts.
      class  SavingsAccount
      SavingsAccount class is for the creation of savings accounts by extending the abstract class BankAccount
      Methods in accounts with parameters of type BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean BankAccount.transfer(int cents, BankAccount fromAccount, BankAccount toAccount)
      Method to transfer funds between accounts
